DOC.brief_summary: The incidence of pin site infection is related to the nursing management of external fixation.
DOC.brief_title: Nursing Care Management of External Fixation in Hospitalization: Pin Site Infection Incidence
DOC.criteria: 18 year old patients Immune Depression Patients who are treated with immunosupressive drugs or steroids
DOC.keyword: PIN SITE INFECTION AFTER EXTERNAL FIXATION
